newsitem.title: UK: LME copper stable, nickel vulnerable in pre-market.
newsitem.headline: LME copper stable, nickel vulnerable in pre-market.

text.p: COPPER - Little changed from Wednesday's strong close at $2,533. LME stocks draw of 3,550 tonnes supportive. ALUMINIUM - Touch easier but still above $1,640. NICKEL - Barely lower at $7,240/$7,260, but seen vulnerable to downside. ZINC/LEAD - Stable.
